com.opower.connectionpool

Interface ConnectionFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SQLConnectionFactory

    public interface ConnectionFactory
    A factory for creating connections for accessing and processing data stored in a data source (usually a relational database)
    Author:
    dhagan

      Gets a connection from the connection factory.
